articles.title: Ryanggang, Kangwon and South Hwanghae Provincial Conferences of WPK Take Place
articles.content:
Ryanggang, Kangwon and South Hwanghae Provincial Conferences of WPK Take Place
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The Ryanggang, Kangwon and South Hwanghae Provincial Conferences of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) took place on the spot.
					 The conferences were attended by delegates elected by the party organizations at all levels in the provinces.
					
					 All the participants paid silent tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The conferences reviewed the work done by the provincial party committees.
					
					 Reporters referred to the successes registered in the relevant provincial party committees' work and said that the proud successes despite the unprecedented grave atmosphere go to clearly prove that the socialist cause of Juche which is dynamically advancing along the road indicated by the WPK is invincible.
					
					 Speeches were made at the conferences.
					
					 They discussed and decided the tasks for more thoroughly establishing the party's monolithic leadership system and enhancing the function and role of the party organizations as required by the crucial historic period of accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 The conferences reviewed the work of the provincial party auditing commissions and elected the leadership bodies of the provincial party committees.
					
					 There took place the election of delegates and nomination of observers to the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 Speeches on electing supreme leader Kim Jong Un as delegate to the Seventh Congress of the WPK were made there.
					
					 They stressed that it is the manifestation of the absolute trust and noble loyalty of all the party members and people to elect Kim Jong Un who is leading the WPK and revolution to victory with his outstanding idea and rare leadership as delegate of the 7th Congress of the WPK.
					
					 They courteously proposed to elect Kim Jong Un as a delegate to the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 Decisions on electing him as a delegate to the Seventh Congress of the WPK were adopted at the conferences with unanimous approval.
					
					 The officials and party members who fully displayed the ardent loyalty and patriotic devotion to the party's development and building of a prosperous country were elected delegates and observers to the Seventh Congress of the WPK at the conferences.

articles.title: WPK Conferences of Cabinet, KPISF, Ministries of Railways and Culture Take Place
articles.content:
WPK Conferences of Cabinet, KPISF, Ministries of Railways and Culture Take Place
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The Cabinet, Korean People's Internal Security Forces, Ministry of Railways and Ministry of Culture Conferences of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) took place on the spot.
					 The conferences were attended by delegates elected by the relevant party organizations.
					
					 All the participants paid silent tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The conferences reviewed the work done by the relevant party committees.
					
					 Reports on work were made at the above-said conferences. 
					
					 Decisions were adopted at the conferences.
					
					 The elections of the leadership bodies of the relevant party committees were held at the conferences.
					
					 There were the election of delegates and nomination of observers of the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 Speeches on electing supreme leader Kim Jong Un as delegate to the Seventh Congress of the WPK were made there.
					
					 They were unanimous in saying that it is the manifestation of the absolute trust and noble loyalty of all the party members and people that Kim Jong Un was elected delegate to the 7th Congress of the WPK.
					
					 They courteously proposed to elect Kim Jong Un as a delegate to the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 Speakers fully supported the proposal.
					
					 Decisions on electing him as a delegate to the Seventh Congress of the WPK were adopted at the conferences with unanimous approval.
					
					 Delegates and observers of the Seventh Congress of the WPK were elected and nominated at the conferences.

articles.title: Lao Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Lao Delegation Arrives
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Lao Federation of Trade Unions headed by President of its Central Committee Pan Noymany who is member of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to DPRK Martyrs by Military Attaches Corps Here
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to DPRK Martyrs by Military Attaches Corps Here
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here laid wreaths at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery on Monday, the 84th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 They laid bouquets before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk at the revolutionary martyrs cemetery on Mt. Taesong and paid silent tribute to her.
					
					 A wreath in the name of the military attaches corps was laid at the wreath-laying stand.
					
					 They paid silent tribute to the anti-Japanese revolutionary martyrs.
					
					 The military attaches corps laid a wreath before the wreath-laying stand "Soul of Heroes" of the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery and paid tribute to the martyrs of the KPA.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Organization, Figures
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Organization, Figures
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets from the Miyagi Prefectural Japan-DPRK Friendship Association, Daniel Alvarez Celi, secretary general of the Ecuadorian Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung, and Japanese media man Shunichi Narita on Monday, the 84th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were laid before statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 84th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and paid boundless reverence for them.
					
					 A floral basket sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un was seen standing before the statues.
					
					 Placed there were floral baskets in the names of the party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and institutions, industrial enterprises, farms and schools in Pyongyang and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 The participants made bows to the statues.
					
					 An endless stream of service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statues at Kim Il Sung Military University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, the Mansudae Art Studio and other parts of Pyongyang and portraits of the smiling great leaders.
					
					 Service personnel, working people and school youth and children across the country also visited the statues and portraits of the smiling great leaders in their units and residential areas and laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the statues.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Lao Federation of Trade Unions Monday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					 The guests laid bouquets before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Wreathes Laid before Cemeteries across Country
articles.content:
Wreathes Laid before Cemeteries across Country
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Wreathes were laid before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong, the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri and the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery on Monday, the 84th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Wreathes in the name of supreme leader Kim Jong Un were seen standing on the wreath-laying stands of the cemeteries.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremonies were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other leading officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF) and working people in the city.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and observed a moment silence in memory of her.
					
					 Wreathes in names of the Central Committee of the WPK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the DPRK Cabinet were laid on the wreath-laying stand of the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong, a wreath in the joint name of the C.C., WPK, the Presidium of the SPA and the Cabinet on the wreath-laying stand of the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri and a wreath in the joint name of the C.C., WPK, the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the National Defence Commission of the DPRK on the wreath-laying stand "Soul of Heroes" at the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery.
					
					 Laid before the cemeteries were wreathes in the names of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, Ministry of People's Security, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and KPISF, institutions of science, health and media, and party and power organs, industrial establishments and farms in the city.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to the fallen fighters and looked round the cemeteries.
					
					 On the same day wreathes were placed before the statues of the martyrs, cemeteries of the fallen fighters, monuments to the fallen soldiers of the KPA and cemeteries of fallen fighters across the country.

articles.title: KPA Song and Dance Ensemble Celebrate Army Day
articles.content:
KPA Song and Dance Ensemble Celebrate Army Day
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The Korean People's Army Song and Dance Ensemble gave a performance at the Ponghwa Art Theatre Monday, the day of the army building.
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as chorus "Glory to General Kim Jong Un" and kayagum ensemble and male pangchang "Song of Big Fish Haul".
					
					 In serial songs "Under the Banner of the Party" and orchestra and chorus "We'll Travel One Road Forever" the performers impressively represented the steadfast revolutionary faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK who have taken the road of revolution without any vacillation while devotedly defending the cause of Juche, the cause of the party under the leadership of the Songun brilliant commanders of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Men's vocal sextet and trombone solo "Meaningful Soldiers' Days" and dance "Kitchen Car Runs" added to the atmosphere.
					
					 Watching the performance were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other senior officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials and persons of merits of institutions and industrial establishments in Pyongyang.
					
					 Among the audience were the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and overseas Koreans.
					
					 Invited to see the performance were foreign diplomatic envoys and military attaches of foreign embassies here and their spouses.

articles.title: People's Delegations Visit KPA Units
articles.content:
People's Delegations Visit KPA Units
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- People's delegations visited units of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on the occasion of the day of army building.
					 Service personnel of the KPA units and their families warmly welcomed the delegations.
					
					 Gifts sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un were conveyed to the service personnel.
					
					 The members of the delegations conveyed news from the rear and handed over aid materials to service personnel, congratulating them on the 84th founding anniversary of the KPA.
					
					 They joined service personnel in diverse events in commemoration of KPA founding anniversary.
					
					 Members of the delegation visited Kim Sung Chol-led Unit of the KPA laid bouquets before the oil painting depicting President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them. 
					
					 They visited sub-units and went round education rooms, soldiers' quarters, mess halls, etc.
					
					 An art performance given at the posts added to the festive mood.
					
					 A delegation visited Kim Chol Min-led Unit of the KPA honored with the title of the O Jung Hup-led Seventh Regiment and went round its several places.
					
					 They joined sailors in holding sports games and gave an art performance.
					
					 A delegation visited Jo Chol Ryong-led Unit of the KPA honored with the title of the O Jung Hup-led Seventh Regiment and went round several places of the unit and joined the soldiers in sports and amusement games.
					
					 The members of the delegations asked service personnel to be a-match-for-hundred soldiers.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place across the country on Monday, the 84th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 At the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, the Arch of Triumph, the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and other places in Pyongyang youth and students danced to the tune of such songs as "Fortune of Korea" and "July 27 March".
					
					 The participants presented celebration dances, recollecting the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who developed the KPA into the matchless and invincible revolutionary army remaining loyalty to the cause of the party and leaders.
					
					 They danced dynamic and optimistic dances to the tune of songs like "The Guerrilla March ", "At the Plaza of the Military Parade" and "Let Us Meet at the Front".
					
					 Similar dancing parties were held in provincial seats, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: Performance Given by Magicians
articles.content:
Performance Given by Magicians
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by magicians of the National Circus on Monday to celebrate the founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Put on the stage were diverse jugglery pieces.
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the spectators as it fully showcased the developing Juche-oriented acrobatics.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats for Bolstering DPRK's Defence Capability
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats for Bolstering DPRK's Defence Capability
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 84th anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 On this occasion the DPRK people look back on the undying feats President Kim Il Sung performed to bolster up the country's defence capability.
					
					 Kim Il Sung founded the Anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army (later Korean People's Revolutionary Army) on April 25, 1932, as the driving force for the Korean revolution.
					
					 After liberating Korea from Japan's colonial rule, he saw to it that the Pyongyang Institute, the Central Security Officers Training School and other military academies were established as early as possible. And he developed the KPRA into the Korean People's Army (KPA), modern and regular armed forces, on February 8, 1948.
					
					 Under his commandership the KPA won in the 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War against the U.S. imperialist aggressors and thus brought about the beginning of a decline for the U.S. imperialism.
					
					 After the war, he had wisely led the KPA to play a pivotal role in bolstering up the national defence capability and reliably discharge its honorable mission in the confrontation with the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 He made ceaseless inspection of military units, giving primary attention to the strengthening of the army.
					
					 He also attached importance to the strengthening of the country's militia.
					
					 In mid-January 1959 when visiting a village in South Phyongan Province, he matured his plan to found a new type of militia. Then he reorganized the self-defence corps into the Worker-Peasant Red Guards, putting up the slogan "Rifle in one hand and hammer or sickle in the other!"
					
					 And he founded the Young Red Guards in September 1970 and guided it to discharge its mission as part of the militia.
					
					 In order to turn the country into an impregnable fortress, he saw to it that strong defences were built not only in frontline areas but also other parts of the country. 
					
					 Meanwhile, he set forth a unique line of simultaneously carrying on the economic construction and the defence building and further developed the nation's self-reliant defence industry so as to realize on a higher level the work for modernizing the entire army, putting all the people under arms and turning the whole country into fortress. 
					
					 The President's feats for the strengthening of the country's defence capability are now shining more brilliantly under guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: KPA, Creator of People's Wealth
articles.content:
KPA, Creator of People's Wealth
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The Korean People's Army has played a big role in creating people's wealth, holding aloft the slogan "Let the People's Army take charge of both national defence and socialist construction!"
					 The servicepersons have built a number of edifices for the prosperity of the country and people's happiness.
					
					 After the Fatherland Liberation War, they performed great feats in reconstructing Pyongyang City and building the vinalon factory.
					
					 Among monumental edifices representing the era of the Workers' Party is the West Sea Barrage.
					
					 In the period of the Arduous March, the forced march, they built the Anbyon Youth Power Station and performed great feats in sprucing up the whole country by carrying out large-scale land realignment.
					
					 They are now playing a key role in all fields of building a thriving and highly civilized socialist nation.
					
					 Recently, the Munsu Water Park, Rungna People's Pleasure Park, Mirim Riding Club, Okryu Children's Hospital, Masikryong Ski Resort, Yonphung Scientists Holiday Camp, Unha Scientists Street, apartment houses for educators, workers' hostel of Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill and Songdowon International Children's Camp took their shapes thanks to their devoted efforts.
					
					 Last year alone, they completed many edifices, including Mirae Scientists Street and the Sci-Tech Complex, which are conducive to make the people enjoy the highest quality of civilization on the highest level.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Revolutionary Spirit of Paektu, Spirit of Blizzards of Paektu
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Revolutionary Spirit of Paektu, Spirit of Blizzards of Paektu
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Steadfast is the faith of the army and people of the DPRK in the final victory though a touch-and-go situation is prevailing on the Korean peninsula due to the unprecedentedly harsh sanctions and moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers to stifle the DPRK and their dangerous nuclear war drills, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 The army and people of the DPRK cherish the revolutionary faith that they are sure to win as long as they are under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and they have do-or-die readiness to share their destiny with him no matter how frequently the world may change.
					
					 The ideological and moral mainstay of the army and people of the DPRK is the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu which was created under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung during the anti-Japanese war, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu is an unyielding fighting spirit of weathering obstacles and difficulties and a staunch militant spirit of rising up no matter how often one may fall and fighting it out.
					
					 This great revolutionary spirit displayed by the revolutionary forerunners in the flames of the anti-Japanese armed struggle in which the deep and strong roots of the Korean revolution struck serves as a textbook for training genuine human beings and an immortal militant banner as it indicates a path for winning a sure victory.
					
					 The revolutionary spirit of Paektu has helped the Korean people grow up to be a strong revolutionary people winning only victories at all times and the DPRK shed its rays all over the world as a country of miracles and heroic Korea startling the world people.

articles.title: Grit and Pluck of Illustrious Commander of Paektu Represent Might and Victory of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Grit and Pluck of Illustrious Commander of Paektu Represent Might and Victory of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The grit and pluck of the illustrious commander of Paektu represent the might and victory of the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Monday.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The greatness of a country and a nation is decided by its leader and his steadfast revolutionary faith and strong courage and pluck serve as a source of the nation's might incomparable to anything and a weapon more powerful than A bomb. 
					
					 This is irrefutably proved by the history of the Korean revolution. It had to explore a new path of the cause of the anti-imperialist national liberation and the socialist cause under the unprecedentedly arduous and grim situation where the people have stood in confrontation with the imperialist formidable enemies. It proudly reached the eminence of victory by weathering the severe upheaval of the century which mercilessly brought to collapse even those countries with a long history of struggle and tremendous national power. 
					
					 The closing period of the last century which could likely be recorded as the end of socialism is registered as years of the victory of socialism and marked as the period in which the DPRK embarked upon building a thriving nation after proudly emerging an indomitable country. All this was the miracle brought about by the unshakable faith and pluck of the peerlessly illustrious commander.
					
					 Songun Korea succeeded in the H-bomb test at the outset of 2016 and demonstrated its might as a space power, weathering a stern trial in the indomitable spirit. It is courageously dashing ahead to surpass the world's level after breaking the ground for the construction of Ryomyong Street, remaining unperturbed even under the situation where the enemies are bringing the danger of a nuclear war to  heavily hang over the Korean peninsula, vociferating about "beheading operation" and "high-density strike". The world clearly sees in this gigantic appearance of the DPRK the unshakable faith and pluck of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Minju Joson Ridicules Anti-DPRK Confab of Hostile Forces
articles.content:
Minju Joson Ridicules Anti-DPRK Confab of Hostile Forces
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group of traitors held a consultation of vice foreign ministers with its masters the U.S. and Japan in Seoul recently. Here they discussed the issue of ratcheting up "sanctions" against the DPRK, escalating the moves "to isolate and suffocate it" and boosting cooperation in this campaign.
					 Minju Joson Monday in a commentary terms this a futile anti-DPRK confab of the hostile forces taken aback by the spirit of the DPRK on which neither sanctions nor pressure are workable.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrent for self-defense has grown incomparably stronger and grand monumental structures are springing up thanks to it and miracles and great achievements are being registered in the drive for improving the people's living standard and building an economic giant despite the above-said sanctions and moves, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Such being a hard reality, the Park Geun Hye group is desperately crying out for "more closely tightening the noose of sanctions" by throwing the network of "harshest sanctions" and "blockade" in a bid to thoroughly  deter the economy of the DPRK from recovering. This is no more than hysteric fit of those who are unable to know anything about the source of the inexhaustible strength of the DPRK and psychopaths going reckless after failing to attain their sinister purpose.
					
					 No matter what sanctions the south Korean puppet forces are slapping against the DPRK in a bid to isolate and stifle it in league with their masters the U.S. and Japan, they can never block the dynamic advance of Juche Korea and this will reinforce the will of all its service personnel and people to deal merciless retaliatory blows at them. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists, the Japanese reactionaries and the Park group of traitors would be well advised to properly know who their rival is. They had better stop acting rashly, not forgetting even a moment that their anachronistic moves for isolating and stifling the DPRK would only precipitate their self-destruction.

articles.title: Newspapers Praise Feats Performed by Peerlessly Great Persons of Mt. Paektu in Building Army
articles.content:
Newspapers Praise Feats Performed by Peerlessly Great Persons of Mt. Paektu in Building Army
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers here Monday dedicate editorials to the 84th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 The editorials say that the founding of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army by President Kim Il Sung on April 25, Juche 21 (1932) was a historic event to be specially recorded in the history of building the revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 The founding of the revolutionary armed forces of Juche made it possible to fully ensure the leader's guidance over the overall Korean revolution and provided a sure political and military guarantee for triumphantly advancing the revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun, the newspapers note.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says the Korean People's Army (KPA) having the anti-Japanese legendary hero as its supreme commander has demonstrated its might as the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army in terms of idea, spirit, mode of activities and fighting method since its birth. It goes on:
					
					 The President's idea of building the army and his leadership over it served as guidelines and lifeline for all military and political activities of the KPA and his warm comradeship and love for comrades-in-arms were the basic source of bolstering up its combat capability.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il was the peerlessly brilliant commander as he developed the KPA into the army of the leader and the party both in name and reality with his outstanding and tested Songun politics and Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 His Songun leadership for more than half a century was characterized by his most ardent loyalty and moral sense of obligation towards the President and adorned with the legendary stories about how he ushered in a great heyday of increasing the military muscle by successfully carrying forward the feats the President performed in building the army.
					
					 The heroic KPA is now strikingly demonstrating its might as the army devotedly defending the leader at all times and the invincible army of the party as it is under another peerlessly illustrious commander.
					
					 Minju Joson says the glorious history of the Korean revolutionary armed forces is brilliantly recorded with the undying feats of the illustrious commanders of Mt. Paektu. It is the great pride and honor of the Korean people to have the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army which has grown to be a pillar and a main force of the Juche revolution and is fully demonstrating its might before the whole world, the newspaper concludes.

articles.title: DPRK People Enraged at S. Korean Regime's Terrorism
articles.content:
DPRK People Enraged at S. Korean Regime's Terrorism
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean regime recently let its "National Intelligence Service" agents to abduct and take to south Korea DPRK woman employees, who were working at a restaurant overseas.
					 This hideous act is further stirring up all the DPRK citizens' wrath and hatred toward the Park Geun Hye group of traitors in south Korea.
					
					 Jang Won Hyang, an official of the C.C., Democratic Women's Union of Korea, told KCNA:
					
					 The recent abduction case is ascribable to the vicious anti-DPRK confrontation policy pursued by the Park group keen to gratify its ambition for "unification of social systems".
					
					 That's why mothers of those abducted girls have been strongly urging the south Korean regime to return their daughters.
					
					 It is preposterous to expect maternal affection from Park, an old witch experiencing no child-birth, but she will have to give ear to the voice of justice and truth.
					
					 Every sin brings its punishment with it.
					
					 Choe Sun Hui, a teacher of Haeun Senior Secondary School in Phyongchon District, Pyongyang, said:
					
					 All those abducted girls can never "defect", abandoning their homeland and parents, as they grew up in happiness under the loving care of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The south Korean regime is now refusing to open their voices to the press. This evidently shows that the "defection" case is a farce orchestrated by the Park group.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Park group flatly turned down even the just demand of the DPRK for their repatriation, talking about "free willingness" and "international practice". This cannot be construed otherwise than an unpardonable unethical behavior and insult to noble humanitarianism.
					
					 The Park group of traitors should apologize for its unethical crime and send all of those abducted DPRK citizens back to their home at once.

articles.title: Picture Album "Land of Morning Calm" Published by Korean in Russia
articles.content:
Picture Album "Land of Morning Calm" Published by Korean in Russia
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Picture album "Land of Morning Calm" was brought out by Pak Phyong Won, chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Maritime Territory of the Russian Federation.
					 It carries a photo of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun where President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il lie in state and photos introducing the Kimilsungia festival which is held with splendor every year on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of the President).
					
					 Also carried in it are more than 200 photos showing the stirring reality of the DPRK making a steady leaping forward under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, advantageous culture, beautiful nature, diligent and kind Korean people full of national pride.
					
					 Meanwhile, the 13th issue of the Russian newspaper Konkurent introduced the picture album in detail.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked Abroad
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place at the 11th Middle School in Khabarovsk City, Russia, the DR Congo preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung), a primary school in Kuwazana, Zimbabwe and the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany from April 14 to 16 in celebration of the Day of the Sun.
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the art work depicting them before paying tribute to them.
					
					 Andre Lohekele Kalonda, chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo and chairman of the DR Congo preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, praised the President as the peerlessly great man who achieved the historic cause of national liberation and built a socialist country centered on the popular masses in the DPRK under the banner of Juche and Songun in defiance of the aggression and provocation by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany praised the President as the elder statesman of the world who performed the greatest exploits with his energetic ideo-theoretical activities and superb leading ability.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked at DPRK Missions Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked at DPRK Missions Abroad
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Photo and book exhibitions, film shows, receptions and other events took place at the DPRK missions in Romania, Bulgaria, Poland, Germany, Italy, Spain, Switzerland, France, UK, Kuwait, South Africa, Senegal, Guinea, Equatorial Guinea, Algeria, Ethiopia and Venezuela and at the DPRK permanent mission to UN Office and international organizations in Geneva in celebration of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) between April 11 and 14.
					 Displayed at the events were photos documenting the exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and their works, and books and photos introducing the struggle of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "Our Leader Revered by World People" and "Kimilsungia, flower of sun".
					
					 A vice-chairman of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation said the revolutionary career of the President was the life of a prominent revolutionary in which he held fast to the revolutionary principle in the confrontation with the enemy and the socialist construction.
					
					 The honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union said the President, outstanding leader of the Korean revolution and the world socialist movement, performed great exploits which served as the banner of struggle of the progressive people.
					
					 A vice-chairman and concurrently international secretary of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) said the President held high the red flag of revolution and wisely led the socialist cause throughout his life. His revolutionary life is a great example for us to follow, noted the vice-chairman.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Uruguayan Radio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Uruguayan Radio
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The full text of Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was aired by C. Equis 36 Radio Centenario in Uruguay on April 15, the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 The speech, made by Kim Jong Un at the military parade in celebration of the 100th birth anniversary of the President on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), says the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proves the immutable truth that outstanding leaders assure the dignity and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 It sets forth the tasks to glorify the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Romanian Preparatory Committee for Celebrating 7th Congress of WPK Formed
articles.content:
Romanian Preparatory Committee for Celebrating 7th Congress of WPK Formed
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- A Romanian preparatory committee for celebrating the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) was formed in Romania on April 20.
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set the celebration period from May 1 to 10 and decided to hold colorful political and cultural events including seminar and meeting.

articles.title: Venezuelan Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
articles.content:
Venezuelan Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- A Venezuelan preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated on April 18.
					 Omar Lopez, chairman of the Venezuelan National Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to give wide publicity to the exploits of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and reality of socialist Korea ushering in the great heyday of building a thriving nation among the Venezuelan people and dynamically launch activities for supporting the just cause of the Korean people on the occasion of the significant days in 2017.

articles.title: Venezuelan, Peruvian Figures Show Reverence for Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Venezuelan, Peruvian Figures Show Reverence for Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Figures of Venezuela and Peru voiced their boundless reverence for President Kim Il Sung on his birth anniversary.
					 Omar Lopez, chairman of the Venezuelan National Society for the Study of the Juche Idea in an article titled "President Kim Il Sung and Juche idea, might of Juche idea in people's struggle" on April 4 referred to the position and role of the leader in the revolutionary struggle and said that the revolutionary idea founded by the leader served as the guideline for the struggle of the oppressed popular masses.
					
					 The article said:
					
					 The President performed great exploits and, therefore, the Korean people are upholding the President as the great sun.
					
					 The Juche idea guides the progressive people struggling for their independent development like a beacon.
					
					 Julio Cesar Pantigoso Barretto, president of branches of Chiclayo and Trujillo of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship, said in a statement on April 15 that Kim Il Sung is always alive in the hearts of all people, adding that his birthday has been widely accepted as a historic day in the world from long ago.

articles.title: Russian Newspapers Praise Kim Il Sung and WPK
articles.content:
Russian Newspapers Praise Kim Il Sung and WPK
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Russian newspapers made special write-ups on the occasions of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 They carried portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and his photos, and photos of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Argumenti Nejelli on April 7 carried an article titled "Sunny smile", which introduced with backup materials that his smile represents his satisfaction and pride as human being and statesman and his confidence and optimism about the rosy future of socialist Korea.
					
					 Nidjegorodskaya Pravda on the same day cited the facts on the President's personality as a popular leader in an article titled "Day of Sun, birth anniversary of Comrade Kim Il Sung, benefactor of national liberation and eternal President of DPRK".
					
					 The 14th issue of Novaya Gazetta and the 15th issue of Veteran carried articles titled "Banner of independence" and "Judgment by history" praising the President's contribution to the cause of global independence.
					
					 The 13th issue of Konkurent said in article titled "Invincible Workers' Party of Korea" the WPK is recognized by the world people as the powerful party which knows no failure and setback despite turns and twists.
					
					 The April 14th issue of Pravda Primoriya carried an article titled "With line of socialism", which said the socialist line of the President was maintained by leader Kim Jong Il and is now being carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Slam Japan's Hostility towards Koreans
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Slam Japan's Hostility towards Koreans
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on April 19 made public a joint statement to vehemently lambaste the Japanese reactionaries' unethical hostile acts against Koreans.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Ultra-right Japanese reactionaries are floating rumors inciting the anti-Korean sentiment following the powerful earthquake in Kumamoto, Japan.
					
					 A spokesman for the Committee for Aiding Overseas Compatriots of Korea and a vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) issued statements to vehemently condemn this hideous and malicious act.
					
					 This shameless misinformation reminds one of the massacres of Koreans by the samurais at the time of the great Kanto quake in September, 1923.
					
					 This racket is a product of the hostile policy the Japanese authorities persistently pursues towards the DPRK and Chongryon.
					
					 We should not allow the repetition of the terrible 1923 massacres.

articles.title: Foreign Media Praise KPA's Tradition of Devotedly Defending Leader
articles.content:
Foreign Media Praise KPA's Tradition of Devotedly Defending Leader
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Foreign media praised the glorious tradition of the Korean revolutionary armed forces which regarded it as its noble mission and official duty to defend the leader unto death.
					 The Egyptian newspaper Al-Misaiya noted the history of the Korean People's Army (KPA) dignified with glory and victory represented the one of devotedly defending the leader as the KPA has kept it as its invariable lifeline to defend the leader unto death after the war.
					
					 The Lao National Radio aired that the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters of the first generation of the Korean revolution started the tradition of defending the leader at the cost of their lives because they cherished the transparent faith that the victory in the revolution is impossible without the leader and that it is the top-priority mission and noble duty of the revolutionary army to defend the leader unto death.
					
					 The Tehran Times noted that devotedly defending the leader has been the sacred tradition of the KPA.
					
					 The India Europe News and Information Bureau noted modern factories suited to the requirements of the new century and monumental edifices have taken shape one after another in the DPRK as the result of the servicepersons' spirit of devotedly implementing the leader's orders.
					
					 Radio Uganda praised the servicepersons of the KPA who are armed with the spirit of devotedly defending the leader, their will to fight unto death for the country, revolution and socialism and the spirit of unconditionally implementing the leader's orders, stressing this is the true picture of the KPA today.
					
					 The Kuwaiti newspaper Al-Rai and the Guinean newspaper Horoya noted that socialist Korea is ever-victorious as it upholds Marshal Kim Jong Un as the supreme commander and the KPA is playing the vanguard role in all fields such as politics, economy and culture.

articles.title: RPDC cumplira con su responsabilidad y papel para preservacion de ambiente terrestre
articles.content:
RPDC cumplira con su responsabilidad y papel para preservacion de ambiente terrestre
Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ACNC) -- El canciller de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Su Yong pronuncio un discurso el dia 22 en la ceremonia de firma del Acuerdo de Paris sobre el Problema de Cambio Climatico, efectuada en la sede de la ONU.
					Para sumarse a los esfuerzos internacionales por la solucion del problema de cambio climatico y convencido de que se ejecutara con exito el Acuerdo de Paris, la RPDC firmo el actual acuerdo, senalo Ri y continuo:
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC se esfuerza mucho por aportar activamente a la preservacion del ambiente terrestre aun en medio de la peligrosa situacion creada en la Peninsula Coreana debido a los imprudentes simulacros nucleares y las maniobras aviesas de sancion y aplastamiento de EE.UU. y sus satelites.
					
					En el futuro tambien prestara atencion merecida a resolver el problema del cambio climatico mundial bajo el principio de dar prioridad al desarrollo sano de la economia y la mejora de la vida del pueblo.
					
					No es facil de alcanzar la meta definida por el Acuerdo de Paris y esta tampoco se cumple espontaneamente.
					
					La meta sera alcanzada solo cuando todos los paises se cooperen mutuamente con la voluntad politica sin limitarse a firmar el acuerdo.
					
					Al respecto, la delegacion de la RPDC considera que se debe prestar atencion primordial a los problemas siguientes.
					
					Primero, hay que prestar la atencion primordial a asegurar la paz y la estabilidad del mundo para resolver el problema del ambiente terrestre.
					
					La situacion peligrosa creada en la Peninsula Coreana debido a los incesantes simulacros nucleares de EE.UU., muestra que es imposible esperar la solucion exitosa de  todos los problemas sin asegurar la paz y la estabilidad del mundo.
					
					Segundo, es indispensable que las potencias economicas que ocupan la mayoria de la cantidad de expulsion de gas invernadero mundial establezcan con gran ambicion el voluntario plan para la reduccion de gas invernadero y lo  ejecuten con sinceridad.
					
					Es el hecho evidente que sera imposible alcanzar la meta del acuerdo de Paris sin activos esfuerzos y aporte de estos paises que ocupan la mayoria de la cantidad de la expulsion de carbono mundial.
					
					Tercero, es importante que los paises desarrollados esten conscientes de su responsabilidad historica sobre el cambio climatico y ayuden mucho a las actividades de los paises en vias de desarrollo, segun el Acuerdo de Paris, para reducir el gas invernadero.
					
					Debera fundarse el aparato institucional para crear suficientes fondos para la actividad por la reduccion de gas invernadero mundial y tomarse otras medidas practicas por la ejecucion del Acuerdo de Paris.
					
					El canciller coreano subrayo que la RPDC, como pais interesado del Acuerdo de Cambio Climatico de la ONU, cumplira en lo adelante tambien con su responsabilidad y papel en el trabajo por la preservacion del ambiente terrestre y la solucion del problema de cambio climatico.

articles.title: Efectuadas conferencias provinciales de PTC en Ryanggang, Kangwon y Hwanghae del Sur
articles.content:
Efectuadas conferencias provinciales de PTC en Ryanggang, Kangwon y Hwanghae del Sur
Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar las conferencias de las provincias de Ryanggang, Kangwon y Hwanghae del Sur del Partido del Trabajo de Corea con la participacion de los delegados elegidos en las organizaciones partidistas a todos los niveles de las respectivas provincias.
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Los conclaves hicieron balance del trabajo de los Comites Provinciales del Partido.
					
					Los oradores se refirieron a los exitos alcanzaos en el trabajo de sus Comites Provinciales del Partido y enfatizaron en que los exitos orgullosos logrados en la circunstancia severa comprueban claramente la invencibilidad de la causa socialista jucheana que marcha con vigor hacia la meta indicada por el PTC.
					
					En las ocasiones hubo discursos y fueron debatidas y determinadas las tareas para establecer mas estrictamente el sistema de unica direccion del partido y elevar la funcion y el papel de las organizaciones partidistas de acuerdo con la demanda de la epoca historica e importante en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					Luego, se realizaron balances del trabajo de las Comisiones Revisoras Provinciales del Partido.
					
					Se eligieron los organos directivos de los Comites Provinciales del PTC.
					
					Y se efectuaron la eleccion y la recomendacion de los delegados y los observadores para el VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					Hubo discursos de propuesta para elegir al Mariscal Kim Jong Un como delegado al VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que la eleccion del Mariscal, quien con destacada ideologia y extraordinaria direccion conduce a la unica senda de la victoria el PTC y la revolucion coreana, testimonia la absoluta confianza y noble fidelidad de todos los militantes del partido y los habitantes, y propusieron cortesmente elegir al Mariscal como delegado al VII Congreso del PTC. 
					
					Los oradores apoyaron totalmente esta propuesta. 
					
					En los conclaves fue adoptada por unanimidad la resolucion sobre el respecto. 
					
					Los funcionarios y militantes del partido que han manifestado plenamente la ardiente fidelidad y abnegacion patriotica por el desarrollo del partido y la construccion de la patria fueron electos y recomendados como delegados y observadores al VII Congreso del PTC.

articles.title: Conferencias de PTC en Consejo de Ministros, ESIPC y ministerios de Ferrocarril y Cultura
articles.content:
Conferencias de PTC en Consejo de Ministros, ESIPC y ministerios de Ferrocarril y Cultura
Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar en terrenos las conferencias del Consejo de Ministros, el Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, el Ministerio del Ferrocarril y el de Cultura, del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					En las ocasiones tomaron parte los delegados elegidos en las respectivas organizaciones partidistas.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					En las conferencias fueron elegidas las presidencias.
					
					Los conclaves hicieron balance del trabajo de los respectivos comites partidistas.
					
					Hubo informes sobre el balance de trabajo de los respectivos comites partidistas.
					
					En las ocasiones fueron aprobadas las resoluciones.
					
					Tambien, se eligieron los organos directivos de los respectivos Comites del PTC.
					
					Y se efectuaron la eleccion y la recomendacion de los delegados y los observadores para el VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					Hubo discursos para proponer elegir al Mariscal Kim Jong Un como delegado al VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					Los oradores subrayaron unanimemente que la eleccion del Mariscal manifiesta la absoluta confianza y noble fidelidad de todos militantes del Partido y los habitantes.
					
					Y propusieron elegir al Mariscal como delegado al VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					Los oradores apoyaron totalmente esta propuesta.
					
					Fue aprobada por unanimidad la resolucion al respecto.
					
					Y fueron electos los delegados y encomendados los observadores para el VII Congreso del PTC.

articles.title: Minju Joson critica complots de las fuerzas hostiles contra la RPDC
articles.content:
Minju Joson critica complots de las fuerzas hostiles contra la RPDC
Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ACNC) -- Hace poco, la banda titere de Park Geun-hye sostuvo en Seul la reunion consultiva de vicecancilleres con los sus amos yanquis y japoneses para elevar mas el grado de "sancion, aislamiento y aplastamiento" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y fortalecer la cooperacion.
					Esto no pasa de ser un complot inutil de las fuerzas hostiles muy atemorizadas y apresuradas por el impetu de la RPDC que no se arrodilla ante cualquier sancion y represion.
					
					Asi burla el rotativo Minju Joson del dia 25 en un comentario individual y prosigue:
					
					Aun en medio de las incesantes tentativas de sancion, aislamiento y aplastamiento de los enemigos, el disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo de la RPDC se hizo mas fuete que nunca, se levantan las gigantescas creaciones monumentales y se logran notables exitos en la mejora de vida del pueblo y la construccion de la potencia economica.
					
					A pesar de esta realidad, la banda de Park Geun-hye habla de la necesidad de formar la red densa de "sancion" y "bloqueo" y apretar mas su lazo para impedir eternamente el desarrollo de la economia de la RPDC. Esto es una histeria de los ignorantes de la potencialidad de la RPDC y de los psicopatas muy desesperados por no alcanzar sus objetivos necios.
					
					Por muy tesoneras las cooperaciones entre los titeres surcoreanos, EE.UU. y Japon para aislar y aplastar la RPDC, no se lograra el objeto de impedir el avance vigoroso de la Corea del Juche, sino se redoblara mas el sentimiento de venganza despiadada de los militares y civiles coreanos.
					
					Los imperialistas yanquis, los reaccionarios japoneses y los traidores surcoreanos deben actuar con prudencia sin olvidar que sus anacronicas maniobras de aislamiento y aplastamiento anti-RPDC adelantaran solamente su autodestruccion.
